name: My Sister is a Hecking BAKA! [DEMO]
name_original: My Sister is a Hecking BAKA! [DEMO]
description: My Sister is a Hecking BAKA! is a short concept of an alchemy-theme game for the Lame Jam 17. The plot has already been created but I only had time to complete the first chapter before the deadline. If there is any interest in the completion of this VN then let me know.
